categories: Category:The Best of Star Wars Insider

nodes.text: Star Wars Insider: Icons of the Galaxy

Star Wars Insider: Icons of the Galaxy is the seventh volume in Titan Comics' The Best of Star Wars Insider bookazine series, which collects material previously published in Star Wars Insider magazine. It was released on January 30, 2018.

Star Wars: Icons celebrates some of the most memorable elements of the saga, whether it be timeless characters such as Princess Leia, Darth Vader and Luke Skywalker, notable scenes, or even much-loved collectibles.

This collection explores iconic highlights of the saga, including interviews with Carrie Fisher and Harrison Ford, a comprehensive look at the legendary Marvel comic-book adaptation, and even more extraordinary characteristics that make Star Wars so unique.
The ultimate exploration of the space fantasy and its icons that changed the world!
